# First Few Rows of Credit Data
```{r}
library(ISLR)
data("Credit")
credit <- Credit
head(credit)
```

# Dimensions of Data
```{r}
dim(credit)
```
# Structure of Credit Data
```{r}
str(credit)
```
# Names of Variables 
```{r}
names(credit)
```
# Education Column
```{r}
education <- credit$Education
```
# All Columns except id
```{r}
allButId <-credit[,-1]
```
# First Three Rows for Age and Cards
```{r}
ageCards<-credit[1:3,c(6,5)]
```
# Ethnicity Sample
```{r}
ethnicSample <- sample(credit[,11],5)
```
